ExecutiveSummary.one_line: Two-agent Generator+Critic protocol for robust drift evaluation and safe deployment.

bullets.item: Defines monitoring signals and acceptance thresholds with guardrails.
Establishes drift-triggered retraining and rollback criteria.
Documents compliance checks and auditability requirements.

SynthesizedConclusion.KeyFinding: Track PSI for top features weekly; alert thresholds at PSI>0.2.
Require staged rollout with A/B guardrails and kill-switch.
SynthesizedConclusion.RiskAssessment: Define retraining triggers and rollback to previous model on critical drift.
